name: The Last Attempt
description:
"Two Gods decide to choose who is the best to create a culture and a civilization to prosper.

Both plays a game. Creating a single creature, and leting him create and evolve the city and relationship between other creatures.


And one of the Gods has his last chance to win. This is The Last Attempt!"

This game is under development, so this version can chance between updates.

There is no current save mode, so all the "progress" will be lost. The system is already in development and will be released in the next version.

Commands:

WASD - Movement

I - Open Inventory

E- Interact with the merchant

Left Mouse button - Use item in HotBar

1~9 - Change selected hotbar's item.

Tutorial:

- Dig a hole in the ground and plant a seed. After that, water the hole. This will change color. Wait for the plant to grow and then click on it to harvest.
